Stab and Shoot.name: Stab and Shoot
Stab and Shoot.flavor: You drive your arrow into an adjacent enemy, pull it out, load it, and fire it at another foe.
Stab and Shoot.requirement: You must be wielding a bow or a crossbow.
Stab and Shoot.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your turn. Make a secondary attack.
Stab and Shoot.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target in weapon range

Perfect Aim.name: Perfect Aim
Perfect Aim.flavor: You take the time to line up a deadly shot.
Perfect Aim.requirement: You must be wielding a ranged weapon.
Perfect Aim.effect: Until the end of your next turn, your next ranged attack gains a power bonus to the attack and damage rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier. If you move or take damage before making a ranged attack, the bonus is lost.

Escalating Barrage.name: Escalating Barrage
Escalating Barrage.flavor: With increasing accuracy and deadliness, you send your shots at multiple foes.
Escalating Barrage.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Escalating Barrage.tertiaryTarget: One creature other than the primary and secondary targets
